english.segment1: If we're to be the light. That shines for all of man. Then how can we light the way. If we don't go to them. I believe to know God's heart. Is to meet them where they are
english.segment2: Won't you shine on. Won't you shine on. You can shine on. Shine on
english.segment3: In all that's said and done. And everything you do. Just let your life glorify. The one who shines on you. I believe we worship Christ. When we show the world His light
english.segment4: Won't you shine on. Won't you shine on. You can shine on. Shine on
english.segment6: Won't you shine on. Won't you shine on. You can shine on. Shine on
english.segment7: Won't you shine on. Won't you shine on. You can shine on. Shine on
